name: Jurassic Fantasy
description:
Felix woke up with no memory in a strange island full of dinosaurs. What to expect? Jurassic Fantasy is a role-playing adventure game where you have to survive in a jurassic island and find out how did you get there and how can you get out. It's a game inspired by DOS aesthetics, but with some modern elements and gameplay.

Features

- RPG and adventure elements.

- Survival open world.
- Dinosaurs.
- Story-driven.
- Stats to improve.
- Dinosaurs.
